server.model

Class MockServerGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.GameManager
      • server.model.ServerGameManager
        • server.model.MockServerGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class MockServerGame
extends ServerGameManager
    This is a mock server game with data for the relevant points It basically populates itself with data
    Author:
    matthewcarlson

    • Method Detail

      • initDiscard

        protected void initDiscard(boolean shouldBeBlank)
        Description copied from class: ServerGameManager
        Initializes the discard list. One entry is allocated per player in the game. If shouldBeBlank is true, all of the entries in the list are set to false. If shouldBeBlank is false, each entry is set to true if the corresponding player should discard, or false if the player does not need to discard (ie, they have 7 or less cards)
        Specified by:
        initDiscard in class ServerGameManager
        Parameters:
        shouldBeBlank - whether to set all values to false
